title: UK : length of wait for security screening in Luton Airport 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of respondents, with a total of 5 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is  negative which exists from 1-5_mins to 21-30_mins.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is  positive which exists from 0_mins to 1-5_mins.
